payload.content: In 10 years, society will be divided into two classes: an overclass leveraging AI for wealth and automated income, and an underclass managed by AI, a phenomenon economists refer to as the "K-shaped economy."

name: In 10 years, society will be divided into two classes: an overclass leveraging A
content: In 10 years, society will be divided into two classes: an overclass leveraging AI for wealth and automated income, and an underclass managed by AI, a phenomenon economists refer to as the "K-shaped economy."

payload.content: The next 2-3 years will determine an individual's position within the K-shaped economy.

name: The next 2-3 years will determine an individual's position within the K-shaped e
content: The next 2-3 years will determine an individual's position within the K-shaped economy.

payload.content: Workers with AI skills earn 56% more than those without, and this premium doubled in a single year.

name: Workers with AI skills earn 56% more than those without, and this premium double
content: Workers with AI skills earn 56% more than those without, and this premium doubled in a single year.

payload.content: Industries adopting AI are experiencing three times the revenue growth per employee compared to others.

name: Industries adopting AI are experiencing three times the revenue growth per emplo
content: Industries adopting AI are experiencing three times the revenue growth per employee compared to others.

payload.content: 90% of workers have not undertaken any AI training.

name: 90% of workers have not undertaken any AI training.
content: 90% of workers have not undertaken any AI training.

payload.content: Goldman Sachs estimates that 300 million jobs will be affected by AI by 2028.

name: Goldman Sachs estimates that 300 million jobs will be affected by AI by 2028.
content: Goldman Sachs estimates that 300 million jobs will be affected by AI by 2028.

payload.content: To avoid being in the 'underclass' of the K-shaped economy, individuals should build systems with AI, automate workflows, and use AI to create value that makes them irreplaceable.

name: To avoid being in the 'underclass' of the K-shaped economy, individuals should b
content: To avoid being in the 'underclass' of the K-shaped economy, individuals should build systems with AI, automate workflows, and use AI to create value that makes them irreplaceable.

payload.content: The gap between those who leverage AI and those who don't will widen significantly within six months, potentially becoming uncrossable within a year.

name: The gap between those who leverage AI and those who don't will widen significant
content: The gap between those who leverage AI and those who don't will widen significantly within six months, potentially becoming uncrossable within a year.

payload.content: The K-shaped economic trajectory post-2025 integration is visualized as two diverging lines: 'High Agency + AI Mastery' curving sharply upward, and 'Low Agency + Managed by AI' curving downward, illustrating the split between adaptive, autonomous individuals leveraging AI and dependent individuals managed by it.

name: The K-shaped economic trajectory post-2025 integration is visualized as two dive
content: The K-shaped economic trajectory post-2025 integration is visualized as two diverging lines: 'High Agency + AI Mastery' curving sharply upward, and 'Low Agency + Managed by AI' curving downward, illustrating the split between adaptive, autonomous individuals leveraging AI and dependent individuals managed by it.
